name: Appditto
description: We're a team of 2 building widely used Banano projects since 2018. Our work includes [Kalium](https://kalium.banano.cc/), [The Banano Tip Bot](https://github.com/BananoCoin/Banano-Discord-TipBot), [MonKey](https://monkey.banano.cc/), [Pippin](https://github.com/appditto/pippin_nano_wallet) and [Nano Dart](https://github.com/appditto/nanodart). [Bananominer](https://bananominer.com/)
